article.headline: Canisius 75, Iona 73
article.story: BUFFALO, N.Y. -- Gaby Belardo hit a layup with 4 seconds on the clock to lift Canisius to a 75-73 victory over Iona on Sunday. Greg Logins scored a career-high 30 points on 11-of-15 shooting and the Golden Griffins (9-10, 3-6 Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference) snapped Iona's five-game winning streak. Canisius led 72-67 with 30 seconds remaining, but a 3-pointer from Sean Armand pulled the Gaels (13-7, 7-2) within two. Iona guard Jermel Jenkins hit a 3 with 10 seconds to go, tying the score at 73 before Belardo's game-winner. Scott Machado's desperation 3-pointer for the win missed as time expired. Machado finished with 17 points, Jenkins added 14 and Kyle Smyth 13. Mike Glover had 11 points and 10 rebounds for the Gaels. Elton Frazier and Belardo scored 11 points apiece for Canisius, which shot 53.8 percent from the floor (28 of 52).

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
